longBusinessSummary: SBI Cards and Payment Services Limited, a non-banking financial company, issues credit cards to individual and corporate customers in India. The company also acts as corporate insurance agent for selling insurance policies to credit card customers. In addition, it offers corporate cards, central travel cards, utility cards, and purchase and virtual cards. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Gurugram, India. SBI Cards and Payment Services Limited operates as a subsidiary of State Bank of India.
